pages.text: The idea of fermenting food and $(l:magical_items/infused_beverages)drinks$(/l) in $(l:general/colored_trees#colored_wood)Colored Wood$(/l) was not far away. Over time, the properties of the wood influences and affects the contents.$(br2)The results are sometimes more, sometimes less delicious, but always interesting. (On the other hand, the last could of course also be due to your cooking skills)
